meanings.definition: A photograph taken through a microscope.
meanings.sent1: The science book had many photomicrographs of tiny cells.
meanings.sent2: The biologist studied the photomicrographs of bacteria under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The photomicrographs of the ants made them look like giants!
meanings.sent4: The photomicrographs revealed a hidden world invisible to the naked eye.
meanings.sent5: The photomicrographs captured the intricate details of the butterfly's wings.

meanings.definition: To take a photograph through a microscope.
meanings.sent1: Scientists often photomicrograph cells to study them closely.
meanings.sent2: She carefully photomicrographs each specimen for her research.
meanings.sent3: The curious student decided to photomicrograph his own fingerprints.
meanings.sent4: The artist's goal was to photomicrograph the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent5: The photographer loves to photomicrograph tiny insects in the garden.
